name: stock-market-dashboard
description: Real-time stock market dashboard with React, TypeScript, and optimized data fetching

skills.name: Stock API Manager
skills.description: Handles stock data fetching from multiple sources with caching, error handling, and fallback mechanisms

skills.name: Stock Data Cache
skills.description: Implements intelligent caching for stock data with configurable TTL

skills.name: Stock Error Handler
skills.description: Provides comprehensive error handling with fallback to mock data

skills.name: UI Responsive Adapter
skills.description: Handles responsive design for H5 and PC platforms

errors.solution: Rename export to match import or add missing export

errors.message: Circular import between stockApi.ts and stockDataGenerator.ts
errors.solution: Remove bidirectional imports, use one-way dependency

errors.message: HTTP 403 Forbidden from Sina Finance API
errors.solution: Enhanced proxy configuration with proper headers

changes: Initial project setup with React and TypeScript
Added Chinese and US stock support
Optimized components with React.memo and useCallback
Implemented lazy loading for better performance
Fixed API errors with multi-source fallback
